0871A46B.Toast: The tormented spirit of a Black Asylum inmate reaches out for company.

B8A227EA.Callback4Header: Slay the tormented spirit of Corik Trost

C3B68EF9.Phase13Description: I should return to Vendral Trost and inform him that I have released the vengeful spirit of his son.

D53BFF05.Phase0Description:
I met a grieving father who is haunted by visions of his dead son.

I must enter the Black Asylum and destroy the tormented spirit of Corik Trost.
